scripts.build: npm run --silent build:typescript && npm run --silent build:split-environment
scripts.build:split-environment: npm run --silent build:split-environment:node && npm run --silent build:split-environment:webextension
scripts.build:split-environment:node: echo 'Applying SPLIT_ENVIRONMENT hack for node' && find ./dist/cjs -type f -print0 | xargs -0 sed --in-place='~' 's/SPLIT_ENVIRONMENT/node/g'
scripts.build:split-environment:webextension: echo 'Applying SPLIT_ENVIRONMENT hack for webextension' && find ./dist/esm -type f -print0 | xargs -0 sed --in-place='~' 's/SPLIT_ENVIRONMENT/webextension/g'
scripts.rebuild: npm run --silent clean && npm run --silent build
